name: Katana
description: After reloading, summon a Magic Sword that deals 22 damage and lasts 5 seconds.

name: Raven
description: Summons a Crow that inflicts Curse. Curse deals damage equal to 200% of your bullet damage.

name: Hastur
description: Periodically summons a Tentacle that attacks enemies for 30 damage.

name: Dasher
description: Every 10 seconds, temporarily transforms into a deer. While in deer form, she is invincible and deals 100 damage to enemies she runs over. Deer form's damage is increased by Summon damage and Move Speed.

name: Luna
description: When reloading, a Black Hole is created that pulls in nearby enemies.

name: Yuki
description: On every 6th shot, sends out a Frost Butterfly that periodically freezes nearby enemies. If affected enemies are already frozen, they instead take damage equal to the player's bullet damage.

name: Abby
description: On right click, quickly shoots all remaining ammo in random directions.

name: Lilith
description: Summons a spirit when enemies are killed. Spirits chase down nearby enemies and deal 8 damage.

name: Spark
description: Bullets have a 50% chance to call down Lightning on impact for 5 damage.

name: Hina
description: On right click, summons a Shadow Clone that attacks nearby enemies. Shadow Clone deals damage equal to the player's Bullet Damage.

name: Scarlett
description: On every 3rd shot, throws out a wave of fire that burns enemies for 3 damage per second.

name: Diamond
description: Has the highest starting HP of all the characters.

name: Shana
description: Starter character. Can reroll upgrades once per level.
